title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to former MLB pitcher Al Leiter about the way teams are pitching to Aaron Judge. Should they be intentionally walking him? The Weather Channel's Jim Cantore joins the show to share the latest about Hurricane Ian from Florida, and MMQB's Albert Breer discusses the hazards of Metlife Stadium's turf.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
